00023 #ifndef PTHREAD_H
00024 #define PTHREAD_H
00025 
00026 #include "system.h"
00027 #include "log.h"
00028 #include <pthread.h>
00029 #include <string.h>
00030 
00032 extern pthread_mutex_t zfsd_mutex_initializer;
00033 
00034 #define zfsd_mutex_init(M) ((*(M) = zfsd_mutex_initializer), 0)
00035 #define zfsd_cond_init(C) pthread_cond_init (C, NULL)
00036 
00038 #if defined(ENABLE_CHECKING) && (GCC_VERSION > 2007)
00039 
00040 #include <stdio.h>
00041 #include <errno.h>
00042 #include "log.h"
00043 
00044 #define zfsd_mutex_destroy(M) __extension__                             \
00045   ({                                                                    \
00046     int def_ret;                                                                \
00047                                                                         \
00048     message (LOG_LOCK, FACILITY_THREADING, "MUTEX %p DESTROY, by %lu at %s:%d\n",               \
00049              (void *) M,                                                \
00050              (unsigned long) pthread_self (), __FILE__, __LINE__);      \
00051     if ((def_ret = pthread_mutex_destroy (M)) != 0)                             \
00052       {                                                                 \
00053         message (LOG_WARNING, FACILITY_THREADING, "pthread_mutex_destroy: %d = %s\n",           \
00054                  def_ret, strerror (def_ret));                                  \
00055         abort ();                                                       \
00056       }                                                                 \
00057     0; })
00058 
00059 #define zfsd_mutex_lock(M) __extension__                                \
00060   ({                                                                    \
00061     int def_ret;                                                                \
00062                                                                         \
00063     message (LOG_LOCK, FACILITY_THREADING, "MUTEX %p LOCK, by %lu at %s:%d\n",          \
00064              (void *) M,                                                \
00065              (unsigned long) pthread_self (), __FILE__, __LINE__);      \
00066     if ((def_ret = pthread_mutex_lock (M)) != 0)                                \
00067       {                                                                 \
00068         message (LOG_ERROR, FACILITY_THREADING, "pthread_mutex_lock: %d = %s\n",                \
00069                  def_ret, strerror (def_ret));                                  \
00070         abort ();                                                       \
00071       }                                                                 \
00072     message (LOG_LOCK, FACILITY_THREADING, "MUTEX %p LOCKED, by %lu at %s:%d\n",                \
00073              (void *) M,                                                \
00074              (unsigned long) pthread_self (), __FILE__, __LINE__);      \
00075     0; })
00076 
00077 #define zfsd_mutex_unlock(M) __extension__                              \
00078   ({                                                                    \
00079     int def_ret;                                                                \
00080                                                                         \
00081     message (LOG_LOCK, FACILITY_THREADING, "MUTEX %p UNLOCK, by %lu at %s:%d\n",                \
00082              (void *) M,                                                \
00083              (unsigned long) pthread_self (), __FILE__, __LINE__);      \
00084     if ((def_ret = pthread_mutex_unlock (M)) != 0)                              \
00085       {                                                                 \
00086         message (LOG_ERROR, FACILITY_THREADING, "pthread_mutex_unlock: %d = %s\n",              \
00087                  def_ret, strerror (def_ret));                                  \
00088         abort ();                                                       \
00089       }                                                                 \
00090     0; })
00091 
00092 #define zfsd_cond_destroy(C) __extension__                              \
00093   ({                                                                    \
00094     int def_ret;                                                                \
00095                                                                         \
00096     if ((def_ret = pthread_cond_destroy (C)) != 0)                              \
00097       {                                                                 \
00098         message (LOG_ERROR, FACILITY_THREADING, "pthread_cond_destroy: %d = %s\n",              \
00099                  def_ret, strerror (def_ret));                                  \
00100         abort ();                                                       \
00101       }                                                                 \
00102     0; })
00103 
00104 #define zfsd_cond_wait(C, M) __extension__                              \
00105   ({                                                                    \
00106     int def_ret;                                                                \
00107                                                                         \
00108     message (LOG_LOCK, FACILITY_THREADING, "COND %p WAIT with MUTEX %p, by %lu at %s:%d\n",\
00109              (void *) C, (void *) M,                                    \
00110              (unsigned long) pthread_self (), __FILE__, __LINE__);      \
00111     if ((def_ret = pthread_cond_wait (C, M)) != 0)                              \
00112       {                                                                 \
00113         message (LOG_ERROR, FACILITY_THREADING, "pthread_cond_wait: %d = %s\n",         \
00114                  def_ret, strerror (def_ret));                                  \
00115         abort ();                                                       \
00116       }                                                                 \
00117     0; })
00118 
00119 #define zfsd_cond_signal(C) __extension__                               \
00120   ({                                                                    \
00121     int def_ret;                                                                \
00122                                                                         \
00123     message (LOG_LOCK, FACILITY_THREADING, "COND %p SIGNAL, by %lu at %s:%d\n",         \
00124              (void *) C,                                                \
00125              (unsigned long) pthread_self (), __FILE__, __LINE__);      \
00126     if ((def_ret = pthread_cond_signal (C)) != 0)                               \
00127       {                                                                 \
00128         message (LOG_ERROR, FACILITY_THREADING, "pthread_cond_signal: %d = %s\n",               \
00129                  def_ret, strerror (def_ret));                                  \
00130         abort ();                                                       \
00131       }                                                                 \
00132     0; })
00133 
00134 #define zfsd_cond_broadcast(C) __extension__                            \
00135   ({                                                                    \
00136     int def_ret;                                                                \
00137                                                                         \
00138     message (LOG_LOCK, FACILITY_THREADING, "COND %p BROADCAST, by %lu at %s:%d\n",              \
00139              (void *) C,                                                \
00140              (unsigned long) pthread_self (), __FILE__, __LINE__);      \
00141     if ((def_ret = pthread_cond_broadcast (C)) != 0)                            \
00142       {                                                                 \
00143         message (LOG_ERROR, FACILITY_THREADING, "pthread_cond_broadcast: %d = %s\n",    \
00144                  def_ret, strerror (def_ret));                                  \
00145         abort ();                                                       \
00146       }                                                                 \
00147     0; })
00148 
00150 #define CHECK_MUTEX_LOCKED(M)                                           \
00151   ({                                                                    \
00152   do {                                                                  \
00153     if (M)                                                              \
00154       {                                                                 \
00155                                                                         \
00156         message (LOG_LOCK, FACILITY_THREADING, "MUTEX %p CHECK, by %lu at %s:%d\n",     \
00157                  (void *) M,                                            \
00158                  (unsigned long) pthread_self (), __FILE__, __LINE__);  \
00159         if( pthread_mutex_lock (M)!= EDEADLK )                                          \
00160           abort ();                                                     \
00161       }                                                                 \
00162   } while (0);                                                          \
00163   })
00164 
00166 #define CHECK_MUTEX_UNLOCKED(M)                                         \
00167   ({                                                                    \
00168   do {                                                                  \
00169     if (M)                                                              \
00170       {                                                                 \
00171         message (LOG_LOCK, FACILITY_THREADING, "MUTEX %p CHECK, by %lu at %s:%d\n",     \
00172                  (void *) M,                                            \
00173                  (unsigned long) pthread_self (), __FILE__, __LINE__);  \
00174         if (pthread_mutex_lock (M) == EDEADLK)                                          \
00175           abort ();                                                     \
00176         if (r == 0)                                                     \
00177           pthread_mutex_unlock (M);                                     \
00178       }                                                                 \
00179   } while (0);                                                          \
00180   })
00181 
00182 #else
00183 
00184 #define zfsd_mutex_destroy(M) pthread_mutex_destroy (M)
00185 #define zfsd_mutex_lock(M) pthread_mutex_lock (M)
00186 #define zfsd_mutex_unlock(M) pthread_mutex_unlock (M)
00187 #define zfsd_cond_destroy(C) pthread_cond_destroy (C)
00188 #define zfsd_cond_wait(C, M) pthread_cond_wait (C, M)
00189 #define zfsd_cond_signal(C) pthread_cond_signal (C)
00190 #define zfsd_cond_broadcast(C) pthread_cond_broadcast (C)
00191 #define CHECK_MUTEX_LOCKED(M)
00192 #define CHECK_MUTEX_UNLOCKED(M)
00193 
00194 #endif
